name: Space Shooter: Star Forces Ships
description:
The colony convoy set out to explore new planets. Protect the convoy against the attack of enemy ships.

BEST ACTION, SPACESHIP AND UPGRADE TYPES.

Want to determine your own game type with different camera angles? Whether first person, third person or top down. What type of game do you want?

Become a STAR PLAYER
* Show that you are the best fighter in the leaderboards!

MAIN FEATURES
* 10 pieces of spaceships at your disposal at your disposal!
* Instant updated score table.
* With 3 different camera angles, you can determine the game type yourself.
* Reach battleships immediately with the reward system.
* 5 different tasks.
* Optimization for Intel x86 mobile devices.
* Low poly designs.

GAME PLAYING
* Tapping control mode.
* Easy fire system without the need to take aim.

REQUIRED PERMISSIONS
* View Wi-Fi connections
To send player scores to the leader board server. (Google Play Services)
